程序包 com.example.eventlink_qr_pro

类 Attendee

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlink_qr_pro.Attendee
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable
public class Attendee extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an attendee of an event, encapsulating details such as name, phone number, email, and location information. This class also handles attendee-specific actions like locating the device and managing Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) tokens.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Attendee

      public Attendee()
      Default constructor required for Firestore deserialization. Initializes a new instance of the Attendee class without setting properties.

    • Attendee

      public Attendee(String id, String name, String phoneNumber, String email)
      Constructs a new instance of the Attendee class with specified id, name, phoneNumber, and email.
      参数:
      id - The unique identifier for the attendee.
      name - The name of the attendee.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the attendee.
      email - The email address of the attendee.

    • find_location

      public void find_location(android.content.Context context)
      Determines the current location of the device and sets the latitude and longitude fields of the attendee. This method requires the ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION or ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION permission to be granted.
      参数:
      context - The context from which the system Location Service can be accessed.
